definition: confidential aspects of a matter/secrets/key moment for action

sentences.english: Growing restriction of the range of public information under the pressure of military secrecy.
sentences.chinese: 以保守军事机密为由对公众信息越来越多的限制。

sentences.english: Offices will open across the Straits.
sentences.chinese: 海峡两岸将互设办事机构。

sentences.english: Chinks are overestimating themselves after STEALING military hardware design details from US.
sentences.chinese: 从美国窃取军事机密后，中国佬开始高估自己。

sentences.english: The Expo Bureau is responsible for the day-to-day works of the Executive Committee.
sentences.chinese: 支委会的日常办事机构是上海世博会事务协调局。

sentences.english: Since that time OBERMEYER is present with an office in Wuhan.
sentences.chinese: 从那时起，欧博迈亚公司就在武汉有了办事机构。

sentences.english: We've decided to have a lot of offices locally.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经决定在中国本土设立很多办事机构。

sentences.english: Now, VWS has 3 offices respectively located in Beijing, Shanghai Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 现在，公司在北京，上海和香港都建立了办事机构。

sentences.english: Or perhaps the USA could, you know, actually protect military secrets.
sentences.chinese: 你知道的，也许美国可以真正保护军事机密。

sentences.english: instructing the operation of China's tourist institutions stationed abroad.
sentences.chinese: 指导驻外旅游办事机构的业务工作。

sentences.english: An election committee establishes an office to handle specific matters related to the election.
sentences.chinese: 选举委员会设立办事机构，办理选举的具体事务。

sentences.english: The domicile of a legal person or other organization is at the place of its principal business establishment.
sentences.chinese: 法人或其他组织以其主要办事机构所在地为住所。

sentences.english: He was found guilty of passing military secrets to his Israeli agents.
sentences.chinese: 他因为向以色列特供传递军事机密被判有罪。

sentences.english: A legal person's domicile shall be the place where its main adminis. rative office is. located.
sentences.chinese: 法人以它的主要办事机构所在地为住所。

definition: variant of 倉促|仓促[cang1 cu4]
variant of 倉促|仓促[cang1 cu4]
see 矯枉過正|矫枉过正[jiao3 wang3 guo4 zheng4]
variant of 伺機|伺机[si4 ji1]
